sections.title: Company Overview
sections.content: KYUNGBANG is a specialized company that researches, develops and distributes natural-based daily health and living products. With high-quality ingredients, reasonable pricing and refined design, we aim to build a brand trusted by consumers both domestically and internationally.

sections.title: Brand Story â€“ IRYEON
sections.content: IRYEON started with the philosophy of creating products that families can use with confidence. By minimizing chemical ingredients and using natural extracts such as propolis and herbal ingredients, our goal is to make everyday products safer and healthier.

list.heading: Natural ingredient-based product power
items: Use of propolis, licorice, mugwort, and herbal extracts
Suitable for sensitive skin and oral use

list.heading: One-stop system from manufacturing to distribution
items: In-house product planning and manufacturing control

list.heading: Premium design & gift set specialization
items: Custom production for holidays, corporate, and VIP gifts

list.heading: IRYEON Natural Soap / Shampoo / Body Wash
items: Suitable for families and sensitive users

sections.title: Vision
sections.content: KYUNGBANG aims to grow from a distribution company into a brand-owning manufacturing company.

sections.title: Mid to long term goals
headings: Expansion of functional and quasi-drug products
